title: Bug 2529: Open/Close project not always available
description: Now select both project P1 and P2. Open/Close project option is not always available for project P2.
OB: Open/Close project option is not always available for project P2.
EB: Open/Close project option should always be available for all projects.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2. 
2. Select project P2. 
3. Try to close project P2 and observe if the open/close project option is available.
